job.description:
{"@context": "http://schema.org", "@type": "JobPosting", "datePosted": "2021-10-05T17:22:37.000Z", "description": "

Are you looking to join a ground-floor startup where your work makes an immediate impact?


Do you want to be a part of a dynamic team with diverse backgrounds improving benefit offerings and the experience for employees?


Do you want to be a part of the discussion and impact decisions that shape the future of the company you work for?


Our ideal candidate is a self-motivated problem solver who thrives in an open and collaborative environment. You enjoy supporting and developing an application that will re-invent itself as and scale with market adaptation.

 

Day to Day Responsibilities

  • Writing clean, high-quality, high-performance, maintainable code
  • Develop and support software including applications, database integration, interfaces, and new functionality enhancements
  • Design robust, secure, and scalable features
  • Coordinate cross-functionally to insure project meets business objectives and compliance standards
  • Support, test, and deployment of new products and features
  • Participate in code reviews


Qualifications

  • Bachelor's degree in Computer Science (or related field) Extensive Experience in software engineering considered in lieu of degree.
  • 5+ years of Ruby on Rails development experience
  • Experience working with relational databases, MySQL preferred
  • Expertise in front end technologies (e.g., JavaScript, CSS, HTML, and JQuery)
  • Experience with Agile or Scrum software development methodologies
  • An analytical mind in addition to a problem-solving attitude
  • Ability to multi-task, organize, and prioritize work
